item.title: Installing Python on ChromeOS
item.description: Have a Chromebook? Don’t have Python installed? Or worse, have Python2 and you’d rather have Python3? Let’s fix that! To start out, I want to share a picture from XKCD: Python is notorious for its ability to lull the developer into a false sense of security before they absentmindedly mis-manage their coding environment. It’s unfortunate, and not exactly necessary for a language to require this. Go ahead and search for the golang python enviroment equivalent.
